ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, I carry 2 stacks of Jasper and 2 stacks of Bloodstones - and have for the past 10 levels. BYO_Reagents and your healer/buff types are more than willing
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, I carry 2 stacks of Jasper and 2 stacks of Bloodstones - and have for
the past 10 levels. BYO_Reagents and your healer/buff types are more than
willing to cast w/o all the drivel about "only the tanks get symbols..."
(This is an excellent tip I got off this list! Thanks for posting it!)

But - my suggestion was to basically give the bard:

a) target ony (got to select some one)
b) single pulse song that casts (like charillion song - one shot is all
thats needed)
c) a symbol buff or rune (using one of the reagents - pls pls NOT peridot!)

And then you'd only worry about carrying as many stones as your basic
cleric/pallidan/enchater does. Maybe you'd always have a good supply. Or
maybe you'd have a hot key: "only the bard gets a symbol buff because...."
<g>

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Adam Wasserman <wassermana@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 1:14 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Missing Songs!!


> From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
>
> ack, a reagent?
>
> Can you imagine carrying 20 reagents to handle singing that song through
one
> fight?
>
> I think a different solution needs to be reached.
>
> Draelon Stormsong
